Basilisk.name: Basilisk
Basilisk.text: Try as you might, you have met the gaze of the Basilisk as your feet turn rigid.

Bearded Devil.name: Bearded Devil
Bearded Devil.text: The Devil lashes you with a giant whip studded in razor sharp spines.

Blue Dragon Wyrmling.name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
Blue Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling rears back and fires a storm of ice shards over you.

Doppelganger.name: Doppelganger
Doppelganger.text: You stab yourself in the stomach with your own weapon... or is it you?

Giant Scorpion.name: Giant Scorpion
Giant Scorpion.text: Gods, it stings, by the gods it stings. Why does such a creature exist?!

Gold Dragon Wyrmling.name: Gold Dragon Wyrmling
Gold Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling sprints to you, grasping you with razor sharp wing talons, and rends your body with claws and teeth.

Green Hag.name: Green Hag
Green Hag.text: You feel the sharp end of a kris dagger sink into your spine.

Hell Hound.name: Hell Hound
Hell Hound.text: The only thing worse than the bite you just received is the involuntary cauterization that followed.

Death Knight.name: Death Knight
Death Knight.text: The Death Knight raises an ethereal tentacle that entangles your leg and saps your living essence.

Manticore.name: Manticore
Manticore.text: The Manticore pounces; with jaws around your neck you feel the sting of a needle enter your shoulder.

Minotaur.name: Minotaur
Minotaur.text: That axe was not just for looks. That was not just for looks at all.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.text: The Nightmare charges through you as if you were tissue paper.

Owlbear.name: Owlbear
Owlbear.text: Owly is that you? Owly please...

Phase Spider.name: Phase Spider
Phase Spider.text: You lost track of the spider... The erie pain in your back reminds you where it went.

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.text: The Werewolf sinks its fangs into your neck, as the full moon gets brighter, and brighter.

Wight.name: Wight
Wight.text: The Wight is a better swordsman than you are. Much better.

Winter Wolf.name: Winter Wolf
Winter Wolf.text: The Wolf latches onto you, chilling your arm to the bone and through the blood.
